text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Trump is a liar and just cannot seem to stop lying, even when called out on his lies, he doubles down on them again and again.
Example "inherited broken tests for covid-19"... covid-19 did not exist before 2019, the "broken" ones were made in 2020.
etc...
